  }
}

graphql.query:
query SearchListing($furnishing: [FurnishType!], $houseRules: [HouseRule!], $locationId: String, $maxPrice: Int, $minPrice: Int, $numBedroom: [RoomCount!], $page: Int, $perPage: Int, $propertyGroupType: [PropertyGroupType!], $propertyType: [LocationPropertyType!], $publicTransportOptions: [PublicTransportOption!], $sort: Sort, $unitType: [UnitType!], $unitPropertyType: [UnitPropertyType!], $searchNameQuery: String, $latitude: Float, $longitude: Float) {
  listingSearchFromIndex(furnishing: $furnishing, houseRules: $houseRules, locationId: $locationId, maxPrice: $maxPrice, minPrice: $minPrice, numBedroom: $numBedroom, page: $page,  perPage: $perPage, propertyGroupType: $propertyGroupType, propertyType: $propertyType, publicTransportOptions: $publicTransportOptions, sort: $sort, unitType: $unitType, unitPropertyType: $unitPropertyType, searchNameQuery: $searchNameQuery, latitude: $latitude, longitude: $longitude) {
    ...paginateInfo
    data {
      id
      area
      bathroom
      bedroom
      squareFeet
      price
      photoUrls
      unitPropertyType
      address {
        ...addressInfoDto
        __typename
      }
      unitType
      status
      roomType
      bathroomType
      genderRule
      property {
        location {
          propertyType
          propertyGroupType
          latitude
          longitude
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      tags
      verified
      __typename
    }
    nearbyAreas {
      id
      name
      latitude
      longitude
      __typename
    }
    nearbyProperties {
      id
      name
      latitude
      longitude
      __typename
    }
    nearbyListings {
      id
      area
      bathroom
      bedroom
      squareFeet
      price
      photoUrls
      unitPropertyType
      address {
        ...addressInfoDto
        __typename
      }
      unitType
      status
      roomType
      bathroomType
      genderRule
      property {
        location {
          propertyType
          propertyGroupType

          __typename

        __typename

      __typename

    __typename

}

exec: tests["Get collectionType with booking id" + " " + json.data.getBooking.id] = true;
tests["'getBooking.collectionType' should be exist in the response"] = json.data.getBooking.hasOwnProperty('collectionType');
tests["'getBooking.collectionType' should be equal to 'PASS_LEAD'"] = json.data.getBooking.collectionType === "PASS_LEAD";
tests["'getBooking.collectionStatus' should be exist in the response"] = json.data.getBooking.hasOwnProperty('collectionType');
tests["'getBooking.collectionStatus' should be equal to 'true'"] = json.data.getBooking.collectionStatus === true;
